column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Every once in a while something comes along that's so good you feel compelled to challenge your vocabulary and come up with a better adjective to describe it than just your garden variety "awesome" or "amazing". Common Bond is that phenomenon. Everything from the decor
column3: the attention to detail (even their napkins are beautiful)
column7: can only be described as exquisite. I was smitten from the minute I saw its future offerings on the facebook page before it had opened.
